trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lenexa
There were no other sightings in Lenexa on or around October 23rd 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were on a street called Pflumm in Lenexa KS and my son says daddy what is that. I looked up and saw a jagged chevron in the sky with a small craft following close behind. I almost hit the van in front of me because I was so suprised. I saw multiple flashing colors and heard no sound. I am 42 years old and my son is 10 years old. We both saw exactly the same thing. It moved in a sideways motion as if it was gliding through the sky at a super slow speed. It was about 200 to 300 feet off of the ground.
